meanings.sent1: I alphabeted my bookshelf to find my favorite book easily.
meanings.sent2: She alphabeted the list of names for the class roster.
meanings.sent3: The librarian alphabeted the books so well that even the dust couldn't find its way in between.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were alphabeted in his mind, neatly organized like a well-kept library.
meanings.sent5: The teacher alphabeted the letters on the board, making it a fun learning game for the students.

meanings.definition: Having been put in alphabetical order.
meanings.sent1: The alphabeted files were easy to locate in the cabinet.
meanings.sent2: The dictionary was alphabeted for quick reference.
meanings.sent3: The alphabeted folders on the desk looked like a colorful rainbow of organization.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were alphabeted, making it easier for her to focus on one thing at a time.
meanings.sent5: The alphabeted cards made it simple for the children to learn their ABCs.
